text:
Hi there. I'm using `{% import %}` to combine a group of HubDB tables into a single object.
```{% import "/filepath/filename.html" as hubdbmaster %}```
Is there anyway I can defer this import until after the document is ready in order to avoid excess loading times?
<@USJLWLC2V> hubl is always going to be rendered serverside

As BJ stated HubL is serverside. That said depending on what you’re trying to do using our APIs may be a good solution to move the work to the client side via JavaScript.

Note if you need to use any auth’d endpoints, I’d recommend using serverless functions
